$.each(GetAddress.data,function(){
    
    let newRowUrl = this.url;
    let newRowId = this.id;
    
 function getJson (response) {
    
   return response.json();
  
 }

Promise.all([
  fetch('https://api.getAddress.io'+newRowUrl+'?api-key=i0lhe7bHKEm45UU62lM6BQ30143').then(getJson)
]).then(function (results) {
  var values = results[0];
  //alert('Done');
  var FullAddress = skuid.model.map().FullAddresses;
  if (values.length !== 0) {
    // Do stuff
   // alert(values.postcode);
    
  
     var row = FullAddress.createRow({doAppend:true,additionalConditions:[
           {field: 'id', value: newRowId},
           {field: 'Postcode', value: values.postcode},
           {field: 'Line 1', value: values.line_1},
           {field: 'Line 2', value: values.line_2},
           {field: 'County', value: values.county},
           {field: 'District', value: values.district},
           {field: 'Town/City', value: values.town_or_city},
           {field: 'Country', value: values.country},
           {field: 'Building Number', value: values.building_number},
           {field: 'Sub Building Number', value: values.sub_building_number}
        ]});
  setTimeout(function(){ FullAddress.save(); }, 3000);
  
 
    // alert('test');
    console.log('Done');
  }


 
}).catch(function () {
  console.log('Error');
});
});

parent.location.reload(true);</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateComments" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var editorWrapper = $('#UnderwritingError');

//alert(editorWrapper.length);
if(editorWrapper.length === 0 && skuid.page.params.id)
{
    var editorWrapper = $('#UWErrorTitle');
}

//var model = arguments[0].model, row = arguments[0].row;
//model.updateRow(row, {Underwriting__c:''});

//var row = arguments[0].row;
//alert("Test"+row);
//console.log(skuid.page.params);
//console.log(underwritingModel.data);
var editor = editorWrapper.data('object').editor;
var underwritingModel = skuid.model.getModel('Underwriting');
var uwRow = underwritingModel.data[0];
var decision = uwRow.genesis_Decision__c;
//alert(decision);
var reasonfordecline = uwRow.Reason_for_decline__c;
//alert(reasonfordecline);

var affordabilitycomment = uwRow.genesis_Affordability_comment__c;
var affordabilitycommentFieldLen = underwritingModel.getField('genesis_Affordability_comment__c').length||255;

//alert("affordabilitycommentFieldLen : "+underwritingModel.getField('genesis_Affordability_comment__c').length);
//alert(affordabilitycomment.length);
//alert(Underwriting__C.genesis_Affordability_comment__c);

var cabotcomment = uwRow.genesis_Cabot_Comment__c;
var cabotcommentFieldLen = underwritingModel.getField('genesis_Cabot_Comment__c').length||255;

var error = false;
editor.clearMessages();
if(affordabilitycomment && affordabilitycomment.length>affordabilitycommentFieldLen){
    
    editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Affordability comment: data value too large (max length='+affordabilitycommentFieldLen+')',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        error = true;
}

if(cabotcomment && cabotcomment.length>cabotcommentFieldLen){
    
    editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Cabot comment: data value too large (max length='+cabotcommentFieldLen+')',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        error = true;
}
/*if(decision === 'Decline' && (reasonfordecline === undefined || reasonfordecline === '')){
    
    editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Enter value for reasonfordecline field',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        error = true;
} */

if(error === true)
{
    return false;
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="Underwritinghistory" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var uwRow,uwhRow,uwCom;
var underwritingHistroy = skuid.model.getModel('underwritingHistory');
if(underwritingHistroy)
uwhRow = underwritingHistroy.data[0];

var Underwriting = skuid.model.getModel('Underwriting');
if(Underwriting)
uwRow = Underwriting.data[0];

if(uwhRow && uwhRow.genesis_Internal_fraud_screening__c)
uwRow.genesis_Internal_fraud_screening__c = uwhRow.genesis_Internal_fraud_screening__c;

if(uwhRow && uwhRow.genesis_Rate_to_Reflect_Risk__c)
uwRow.genesis_Rate_to_Reflect_Risk__c = uwhRow.genesis_Rate_to_Reflect_Risk__c;

if(uwhRow && uwhRow.genesis_Recommend_to_Cabot__c)
uwRow.genesis_Recommend_to_Cabot__c = uwhRow.genesis_Recommend_to_Cabot__c;





</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="copyUnderwritingConditions" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
// Fetch Currently Inserted Underwriting ID
var appId = params && params.row && params.row.Id||'';

// Fetch Last Underwriting Id
var underwritingHistory = skuid.model.getModel('application');
var lastUWId = underwritingHistory && underwritingHistory.data[0] && underwritingHistory.data[0].Last_Simply_Decision__r.Id || '';

// Fetch Comments from 
var UnderwriterComments = skuid.model.getModel('UnderwriterComments');
var fetchLastUWC = UnderwriterComments && UnderwriterComments.data || '';

var results = fetchLastUWC.filter(function (entry) { return entry.Underwriting__c === lastUWId; });

var isNew = fetchLastUWC.filter(function (entry) { return entry.Underwriting__c === appId; });


if(results && results.length>0 && isNew && isNew.length === 0)
{
    $.each(results,function(i,row){
        
        // Add rows to UnderwriterComments model
        var NewUnderwriterComments = UnderwriterComments.createRow({ 
                additionalConditions: [
                    { field: 'Underwriting__c', value: params.row.Id },
                    { field: 'Condition__c', value: row.Condition__c},
                    { field: 'Application__c', value: row.Application__c }
                ]
            });
        
    });
}


//Save Underwriting Conditions of UnderwriterComments model
if(results && results.length>0)
skuid.model.save([UnderwriterComments]);</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="updateApplicationFields" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var uwRow,ApplicationRow;

var ApplicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('application');
ApplicationRow = ApplicationModel.data[0];

//var Underwriting = skuid.model.getModel('Underwriting');
var Underwriting = skuid.model.getModel('UnderwritingQuality');

if(Underwriting)
{
    uwRow = Underwriting.data[0];

    if(uwRow && uwRow.isSubmitted__c && uwRow.genesis_Decision__c === 'Accepted')
    {
        //console.log(uwRow.Asset_quality__c + uwRow.genesis_Customer_quality__c);
        ApplicationModel.updateRow(ApplicationRow,'Latest_Underwriter_Quality__c',uwRow.Asset_quality__c + uwRow.genesis_Customer_quality__c);
        ApplicationModel.save();
    }
}

</cssitem></css><javascript><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="customRenderRefField" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],


    value = arguments[1];



if (field.mode === 'read') {


    field.element.append(skuid.$('<div>').addClass('nx-fieldtext').text(field.model.getFieldValue(field.row,skuid.utils.getFieldReference(field.id,field.metadata))));


} else {


    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,value);


}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="customDelete" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
$("#data tr").click(function() {
    $(this).toggleClass("highlight");
});</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="refreshApppage" cachelocation="false">window.location.reload();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="UWMetRender" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0], value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]); 

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,value); 

if (value == 'Satisfied') 
{ 
    field.item.element.addClass("approved");
    
}
else if (value == 'Not Satisfied')
{
    field.item.element.addClass("not-approved"); 
}
else
{
    console.log("Criteria hasn't been met");
}
</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ChecklistStatusRender" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0], value = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]); 

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,value); 

if ( value == 'In Progress' || value == 'Deferred') 
{ 
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("red"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("red");
    }
    
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("green"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("green");
    }
    
    field.item.element.addClass("yellow");
    
}
else if (value == 'Not Applicable')
{
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("yellow"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("yellow");
    }
    
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("green"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("green");
    }
    
    field.item.element.addClass("red"); 
}
else if (value == 'Completed')
{
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("yellow"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("yellow");
    }
    
    if(field.item.element.hasClass("red"))
    {
        field.item.element.removeClass("red");
    }
    
    field.item.element.addClass("green");
    
}
else
{
    console.log("Criteria hasn't been met");
}
</jsitem></javascript><actionsequences uniqueid="sk-1Ou3-976"/></resources><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="color"><styles><styleitem property="background-color" value="white"/></styles></styleitem></styles><interactions/></skuidpage>

 </jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="test_sic" cachelocation="false" url="">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var CreateCustCRN = skuid.model.getModel('Datasourcelogin');
var CreateCustCRNRow = CreateCustCRN.data[0];
var CompNumber = params.row.company_number;
var kycdbid = params.row.id;

var CreateCRNCondition = CreateCustCRN.getConditionByName('company_number');
CreateCustCRN.setCondition(CreateCRNCondition, CompNumber);
skuid.model.updateData([CreateCustCRN],function(){




console.log('Row CRN number:', CompNumber);

var queryForCompany = "select AccountNumber from Account where  AccountNumber = '"+CompNumber+"' ";
var CustomerCount = sforce.connection.query(queryForCompany);
//alert('Customer Count' +CustomerCount.size);
console.log(CustomerCount.size);
if(CustomerCount.size > 0)
{
    alert('customer already available');
}
else 
{
    
    var rowsIndividual = [];
    var rowsCorporate = [];
    var rowofficers =[];
    var idnvidual = null;
    var corporate = null;
    var officers = null;
    
    
    
    var Shareholders = skuid.model.getModel('ShareholderDetails');
    var ShareholdersList = Shareholders.data;
    var ShareholdersCond = Shareholders.getConditionByName('company_Number');
    Shareholders.setCondition(ShareholdersCond, CompNumber);
    
    skuid.model.updateData([Shareholders],function(){
    
    
    //alert('shareholder');
    var rows = Shareholders.getRows()[0];
    var rowsData = Shareholders.getRows()[0].data;
    
    console.log('rows:', rows);
    console.log('rowsData:', rowsData);
    
    if(rowsData) {
        for( let i=0;i<rowsData.length;i++)
        {
            console.log('rowsData:', rowsData[i].id);
            var kind = rowsData[i].kind;
            if(kind.includes("corporate"))
            {
                 rowsCorporate.push(rowsData[i]);
            }
            else if(kind.includes("individual"))
            {
                rowsIndividual.push(rowsData[i]);    
            }
        }
    }
    
    
    console.log('rowsIndividual:', rowsIndividual);
    console.log('rowsCorporate:', rowsCorporate);
    
    
    if(rowsIndividual.length>0 || rowsCorporate.length>0)
    {
        console.log('rowsIndividual.length:', rowsIndividual.length);
        idnvidual = JSON.stringify(rowsIndividual);
        corporate = JSON.stringify(rowsCorporate);
    
    } 
    
    console.log('rowsIndividual : ', rowsIndividual);
    
    var Officers = skuid.model.getModel('OfficersDetails');
    var OfficersList = Officers.data;
    var OfficersCond = Officers.getConditionByName('company_Number');
    Officers.setCondition(OfficersCond, CompNumber);
    console.log('comp number for officer', CompNumber);
    
    skuid.model.updateData([Officers],function(){
    
    // alert('officer');
    
    var rowOfficers = Officers.getRows()[0];
    var rowsOfficersData = Officers.getRows()[0].items;
    console.log('rowOfficers:', rowOfficers);
    console.log('rowsOfficersData:', rowsOfficersData);
    //var officers = JSON.stringify(rowsOfficersData);
    
    
    if(rowsOfficersData)
    {
        for(j=0;j<rowsOfficersData.length;j++)
        {
            rowofficers.push(rowsOfficersData[j]);
        } 
    
    }
    
    officers = JSON.stringify(rowofficers); 
    
    
    // Create related contact       
    
    var cDtl = []; 
    for(var i=0;i<CreateCustCRN.getRows().length;i++)
    {
    
        var row = CreateCustCRN.getRows()[i];
        console.log('company_number::',row.company_number);
        console.log('company_status::',row.company_name);
        // console.log('kycId::', kycId);
        
        if(CompNumber == row.company_number){
            cDtl.push({ 
            'accName': row.company_name,
            'accNumber': row.company_number,
            'kycId': row.id,
            'billingStreet': row.registered_address_line1, 
            'billingCity': row.registered_city,
            'BillingState': row.registered_county,
            'billingPostalCode': row.registered_postcode,
            'billingCountry': row.registered_country,
            'latestAccountsDate': row.last_accounts_made_up_to,
            'filingType': row.last_accounts_type,
            'sic_codes': row.sic_code,
            'companyStatus': (row.company_status === 'active') ? "Yes": "No" ,
            'ownership': row.ownership,
            'LegalEntity': row.legal_entity_type,
            'LegalEntiyId': row.legal_entity_type_id,
            'RegAddressRoad': row.registered_address_road,
            'RegAddressPremises': row.registered_address_premises
            
            });
            break;
        }
    
    }
    
    console.log(cDtl);
    console.log('cDtl : ', JSON.stringify(cDtl));
    var CRNDetails = JSON.stringify(cDtl);
   // var crnDetails = CreateCustNameRow;
  // alert('test');
    
    console.log('CRNDetails::' , CRNDetails);
    
    
    var result =  sforce.apex.execute(
    'SAF_ContactsUtils',
    'CreateContacts',
    {
      CRNDetail : CRNDetails,
      cIndividual : idnvidual,
      cCorporate : corporate,
      cOfficers : officers
    }
    );
    

    //akert(result);
    console.log('Result: ' + result);
    alert('Customer Created Successfully');
    
    /*setTimeout(function(){

	$ = skuid.$;
	
var CreateCustCRN = skuid.model.getModel('Datasourcelogin');
var CreateCustCRNRow = CreateCustCRN.data[0];
var CompNumber = params.row.company_number;

console.log('CompNumber :::'+CompNumber);

var CreateCRNCondition = CreateCustCRN.getConditionByName('company_number');
CreateCustCRN.setCondition(CreateCRNCondition, CompNumber);
    skuid.model.updateData([CreateCustCRN],function(){
        
        var queryForCompany = "SELECT AccountNumber FROM Account WHERE AccountNumber = '"+CompNumber+"' ";
        var CustomerCount = sforce.connection.query(queryForCompany);
        console.log(CustomerCount.size);
        
        if(CustomerCount.size > 0)
        {
            var rowsIndividual = [];
            var rowsCorporate = [];
            var rowofficers =[];
            var idnvidual = null;
            var corporate = null;
            var officers = null;
            
            var Shareholders = skuid.model.getModel('ShareholderDetails');

            Shareholders.setCondition(ShareholdersCond, CompNumber);

                var rows = Shareholders.getRows()[0];

                if(rowsData) {
                    for( let i=0;i<rowsData.length;i++)
                    {
                        console.log('rowsData:', rowsData[i].id);
                        var kind = rowsData[i].kind;
                        if(kind.includes("corporate"))
                        {
                             rowsCorporate.push(rowsData[i]);
                        }
                        else if(kind.includes("individual"))
                        {
                            rowsIndividual.push(rowsData[i]);    
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                
                console.log('rowsIndividual:', rowsIndividual);
                console.log('rowsCorporate:', rowsCorporate);
    
                
               if(rowsIndividual.length>0 || rowsCorporate.length>0)
                {
                    console.log('rowsIndividual.length:', rowsIndividual.length);
                    idnvidual = JSON.stringify(rowsIndividual);
                    corporate = JSON.stringify(rowsCorporate);
                
                } 
                
                console.log('JSON.stringify(rowsIndividual):', idnvidual);
                console.log('JSON.stringify(rowsCorporate):', rowsCorporate);
                
                var Officers = skuid.model.getModel('OfficersDetails');
                var OfficersList = Officers.data;
                var OfficersCond = Officers.getConditionByName('company_Number');
                Officers.setCondition(OfficersCond, CompNumber);
                console.log('comp number for officer', CompNumber);
                //skuid.model.updateData([Officers],function(){
                    var rowOfficers = Officers.getRows()[0];
                    var rowsOfficersData = Officers.getRows()[0].items;
                    console.log('rowOfficers:', rowOfficers);
                    console.log('rowsOfficersData:', rowsOfficersData);
                    
                    if(rowsOfficersData)
                    {
                        for(j=0;j<rowsOfficersData.length;j++)
                        {
                            rowofficers.push(rowsOfficersData[j]);
                        } 
                    
                    }
                    
                    officers = JSON.stringify(rowofficers); 
                    console.log('JSON.stringify(rowofficers):', officers);

                    var cDtl = []; 
                    for(var i=0;i<CreateCustCRN.getRows().length;i++)
                    {
                    
                        var row = CreateCustCRN.getRows()[i];
                        console.log('company_number::',row.company_number);
                        console.log('company_status::',row.company_name);
                
                        if(CompNumber == row.company_number){
                            cDtl.push({ 
                            'accName': row.company_name,
                            'accNumber': row.company_number,
                            'kycId': row.id,
                            'billingStreet': row.registered_address_line1, 
                            'billingCity': row.registered_city,
                            'billingState': row.registered_county,
                            'billingPostalCode': row.registered_postcode,
                            'billingCountry': row.registered_country,
                            'latestAccountsDate': row.last_accounts_made_up_to,
                            'filingType': row.last_accounts_type,
                            'sic_codes': row.sic_code,
                            'companyStatus': (row.company_status === 'active') ? "Yes": "No" ,
                            'ownership': row.ownership,
                            'LegalEntity': row.legal_entity_type,
                            'LegalEntiyId': row.legal_entity_type_id,
                            'regAddressRoad': row.registered_address_road,
                            'regAddressPremises': row.registered_address_premises
                            
                            });
                            break;
                        }
                    
                    }
                    
                    console.log('cDtl'+cDtl);
                    var CRNDetails = JSON.stringify(cDtl);
                    console.log('CRNDetails::' , CRNDetails);
                    console.log('idnvidual::' , idnvidual);
                    console.log('corporate::' , corporate);
                    console.log('officers::' , officers);
                    
                    var result =  sforce.apex.execute(
                    'SAF_ContactsUtils',
                    'updateContactsfromDB',
                    {
                      CRNDetail : CRNDetails,
                      cIndividual : idnvidual,
                      cCorporate : corporate,
                      cOfficers : officers
                    }
                    );

                    alert(result);
               //});
            
            //});

             alert('customer not available in CL');
        }

        <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="Deposit Validation Check" cachelocation="false">var InModel = skuid.model.getModel('Invoice');
var InRow = InModel.data[0];
//alert(InRow.Id);

var TotalPayable = InRow.Total_Payable__c;
var TotalSupplier = InRow.Total_Paid_To_Supplier__c;

//alert(TotalPayable);
//alert(TotalSupplier);

if(TotalSupplier < TotalPayable){

//SaveModel
InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Deposit_Validation_Check__c',true);
    skuid.model.save([InModel],{callback:function(result){
                if(result.totalsuccess){
                //alert('Saved');
                InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Deposit_Validation_Check__c',true);
                }else{
                    InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Deposit_Validation_Check__c',false);
                      alert('Error: ' + result.insertResults[0]);
                      console.log(result.insertResults[0]);
                }
            }}); 
}else{
    InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Deposit_Validation_Check__c',false);    
   alert('The Total Supplier is greater than the Total Payable. Please ensure that the total supplier added across all assets do not exceed the total payable amount.');
   return false;
}
</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="newSnippet" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var InModel = skuid.model.getModel('Invoice');
var InRow = InModel.data[0];
alert(InRow.Id);

var PayableAmount = InRow.Total_Gross_Amount__c - InRow.Deposit_Paid_To_Supplier__c;

alert(PayableAmount);

InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Payable_Amount_For_Auto_Generation__c',Payable_Amount__c);

alert(Payable_Amount_For_Auto_Generation__c);</jsitem></javascript>

}</cssitem>

        <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="Deposit Validation Check" cachelocation="false">var InModel = skuid.model.getModel('Invoice');
var InRow = InModel.data[0];
//alert(InRow.Id);

var TotalPayable = InRow.Total_Payable__c;
var TotalSupplier = InRow.Total_Paid_To_Supplier__c;

//alert(TotalPayable);
//alert(TotalSupplier);

if(TotalSupplier < TotalPayable){

//SaveModel
InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Deposit_Validation_Check__c',true);
    skuid.model.save([InModel],{callback:function(result){
                if(result.totalsuccess){
                //alert('Saved');
                InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Deposit_Validation_Check__c',true);
                }else{
                    InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Deposit_Validation_Check__c',false);
                      alert('Error: ' + result.insertResults[0]);
                      console.log(result.insertResults[0]);
                }
            }}); 
}else{
    InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Deposit_Validation_Check__c',false);    
   alert('The Total Supplier is greater than the Total Payable. Please ensure that the total supplier added across all assets do not exceed the total payable amount.');
   return false;
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="newSnippet" cachelocation="false">var EQInModel = skuid.model.getModel('Equipment Invoice');
var EQInRow = EQInModel.data[0];
alert(EQInRow.Id);

var IsDelete = EQInRow.IsDeleted__c;

alert(IsDelete);

EQInModel.updateRow(EQInRow,'IsDeleted__c',true);

alert(IsDelete);</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="render button" cachelocation="false">return true;</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="Validate Payables">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var InModel = skuid.model.getModel('Invoice');
var InRow = InModel.data[0];
//alert(InRow.Id);
var EquipModel = skuid.model.getModel('EquipValidation');
var EquipRow = EquipModel.data[0];
var InvalidEquip = EquipRow.countInvalidRecords;

var TotalAppPayable = InRow.Total_Application_Payable_Amount__c;
var TotalGross = InRow.Total_Gross_Amount__c;
var ValidationCheck = InRow.Validated__c;

//alert(TotalAppPayable);
//alert(TotalGross);
if (InvalidEquip !== 0){
     InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Validated__c',false);
    InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Invoice_Status__c','Invalid');
    alert('INVALID INVOICE: One or more of your asset(s) has exceed the total gross amount used. Please fix this before trying to validate any invoice again. ');
   return false;
}
else if(TotalGross == TotalAppPayable && ValidationCheck === false){

//SaveModel
InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Validated__c',true);
InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Invoice_Status__c','Valid');
    skuid.model.save([InModel],{callback:function(result){
                if(result.totalsuccess){
                alert('INVOICE VALIDATED');    
                //alert('Saved');
                InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Validated__c',true);
                InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Invoice_Status__c','Valid');
                }else{
                    InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Validated__c',false);
                    InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Invoice_Status__c','Invalid');
                      alert('Error: ' + result.insertResults[0]);
                      console.log(result.insertResults[0]);
                }
            }}); 
} else if(TotalGross > TotalAppPayable && ValidationCheck === false){
    
    InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Validated__c',false);
    InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Invoice_Status__c','Invalid');
    alert('INVALID INVOICE: Application payables should be equal to the total amount of the invoice in order to be valid.');
    return false;


} else if(ValidationCheck === true){

    alert('This Invoice has already been validated.');
    return false;

}    else{
    InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Validated__c',false);
    InModel.updateRow(InRow,'Invoice_Status__c','Invalid');
   alert('INVALID INVOICE: Application payables should not exceed the total amount of the invoice. Please amend the Payables and try again.');
   return false;

width="90%"><components><template multiple="true" uniqueid="sk-yGV-2997" allowhtml="true"><contents><b>Please use a rough guide for rating payouts.</b><br>
<br><em><strong>This is for internal use only.</em></strong><br>
<br><b>Hire Purchase / Finance Lease</b><br>
1. Basic errors on documents, 3 or more incorrect / missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. No communication of deposit payment. Poor communication from broker in general.<br>
2. Basic errors on documents. 2-3 incorrect /missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. No communication of deposit payment. Broker communication could have been better but somewhat helpful.<br>
3. 2-3 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items but communication could have been better.<br>
4. 1-2 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating was good.<br>
5. Perfect payout!  Clear communication, deposit paid and al documents/ invoices correct.<br>


<br><b>Sale & HP Back / Vendor sale</b><br>

1. Basic errors on documents, 5 or more incorrect / missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied. Poor communication from broker in general.<br>
2. Basic errors on documents. 3-4 incorrect /missing items. Not all credit conditions satisfied Broker communication could have been better but somewhat helpful.<br>
3. 3-4 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating could have been better.<br>
4. 1-2 incorrect / missing items. Broker was helpful in retrieving missing items and communicating was good.<br>
5. Perfect payout!  Clear communication, and all documents/ invoices correct and conditions met.<br></contents></template></components></popup></action></actions></field></fields><renderconditions 	var $ = skuid.$;
	$('head').append(
        $('<base target="_blank">')
    );
	
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        $(document).on('click','.fa-times-circle',function()
        {
            var trElem = $(this).parents('tr');
            if(trElem.hasClass('highlight')){
                trElem.removeClass('highlight');
            }
            else{
                trElem.addClass('highlight');
            }
        })
        
         var modelDoc = skuid.model.getModel('DocusignTemplate');
        var ret = sforce.apex.execute("Docusigntemplates","getdata",{});
        modelDoc.updateData(); 
        
        var model_one = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationModel');
		
		//alert(model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c);
		
		if(model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c != undefined && model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c != null)
		{
        	var model_two = skuid.model.getModel('contract1');
            model_two.setCondition(model_two.getConditionByName("agreement"), model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c.split(";"));
            model_two.activateCondition(model_two.getConditionByName("agreement"));
            model_two.updateData(); 
		}
        
        //quote // TerminationQuote
        if(model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_TerminationQuote__c != undefined && model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_TerminationQuote__c != null)
		{
            var model_three = skuid.model.getModel('TerminationQuote');
            model_three.setCondition(model_three.getConditionByName("quote"), model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_TerminationQuote__c.split(";"));
            model_three.activateCondition(model_three.getConditionByName("quote"));
            model_three.updateData(); 
            
            /*var atmt = model_three.data;
            var i=0;
            alert(atmt.length);
            for(i=0; i<atmt.length;i++)
            {
                alert(model_three.data[i].id+' - Contract: '+ model_three.data[i].cllease__Contract__r.Name);
            }*/
            var model_four = skuid.model.getModel('ContraAttachment');
            model_four.setCondition(model_four.getConditionByName("parentid"), model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c.split(";"));
            model_four.activateCondition(model_four.getConditionByName("parentid"));
            model_four.updateData(); 
		}
	});
})(skuid);

{

        {
            if(i === 0)
            {
                //alert(res[i]);
                //contractResult = null;
                //cont = null;
                contractResult = sforce.connection.query("SELECT NAME FROM cllease__Lease_Account__c where Id ='"+res[i]+"'");
                cont= contractResult.getArray("records"); 
                if(cont && cont.length > 0 )
                Agrnames = cont[0].Name; 
                //alert(res[i]+' , Agr: '+Agrnames);
            }
            else
            {
                //contractResult = null;
                //cont = null;
                contractResult = sforce.connection.query("SELECT NAME FROM cllease__Lease_Account__c where Id ='"+res[i]+"'");
                cont= contractResult.getArray("records"); 
                if(cont && cont.length > 0 )
                Agrnames = Agrnames+','+cont[0].Name;
                //alert(res[i]+' , Agr: '+Agrnames);
            }
        }
    if(Agrnames !== undefined)
    appRow.SAF_Contra_Agreement_numbers__c = Agrnames;

    {

            termQuoteResult = sforce.connection.query("SELECT NAME FROM cllease__Termination_Quote_Header__c where Id ='"+res[i]+"'");
            tq= termQuoteResult.getArray("records"); 
            if(tq && tq.length > 0 )
            Termnames = tq[0].Name; 
            //alert(res[i]+' , Agr: '+Agrnames);
        }
        else
        {
            //contractResult = null;

location="inline" name="loadModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	     // Allow Number Only Char
	        $(document).on( "keypress",".numberOnly input", function (e) { 
    	            var allowedChars = '0123456789.';
                    function contains(stringValue, charValue) {
                        return stringValue.indexOf(charValue) > -1;
                    }
                    var invalidKey = e.key.length === 1 && !contains(allowedChars, e.key)
                            || e.key === '.';
                    invalidKey && e.preventDefault();
            });
            
           // Allow Decimal Only including single dot
	        $(document).on( "keypress",".decimalOnly input", function (e) { 
    	            var allowedChars = '0123456789.';
                    function contains(stringValue, charValue) {
                        return stringValue.indexOf(charValue) > -1;
                    }
                    var invalidKey = e.key.length === 1 && !contains(allowedChars, e.key)
                            || e.key === '.' && contains(e.target.value, '.');
                    invalidKey && e.preventDefault();
            });
    	 
    	 // Prevent Paste  
    	  $(document).on( "paste",".numberOnly input", function (evt) { 
    	        evt.preventDefault();
    	    });
    	    
    	    $(document).on( "keydown",".datepickerOnly input", function (evt) { 
    	        evt.preventDefault();
    	    });
    	    
    	    
	var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
	    var pageName = skuid.page.params.page;
	    if(pageName && pageName == 'AddDealsToPackage'){
	        var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLeaseApplication').createRow({});
	    } else{
    	    if(paramId){
        	    queryApplication(paramId);
        	}else{
        	    var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLeaseApplication').createRow({});
        	}
	    }
	});
})(skuid);

function queryApplication(id){
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLeaseApplication');
    var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
    applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,id);
    
    var model_one = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLeaseApplication');
		
		//alert(model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c);
		
		if(model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c != undefined && model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c != null)
		{
        	var model_two = skuid.model.getModel('contract1');
            model_two.setCondition(model_two.getConditionByName("agreement"), model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c.split(";"));
            model_two.activateCondition(model_two.getConditionByName("agreement"));
            model_two.updateData(); 
		}
        
        //quote // TerminationQuote
        if(model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_TerminationQuote__c != undefined && model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_TerminationQuote__c != null)
		{
            var model_three = skuid.model.getModel('TerminationQuote');
            model_three.setCondition(model_three.getConditionByName("quote"), model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_TerminationQuote__c.split(";"));
            model_three.activateCondition(model_three.getConditionByName("quote"));
            model_three.updateData(); 
            
            /*var atmt = model_three.data;
            var i=0;
            alert(atmt.length);
            for(i=0; i<atmt.length;i++)
            {
                alert(model_three.data[i].id+' - Contract: '+ model_three.data[i].cllease__Contract__r.Name);
            }*/
            var model_four = skuid.model.getModel('ContraAttachment');
            model_four.setCondition(model_four.getConditionByName("parentid"), model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_Agreement_number__c.split(";"));
            model_four.activateCondition(model_four.getConditionByName("parentid"));
            model_four.updateData(); 
		}
    
    var model_one = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLeaseApplication');
    //alert('Quote: '+model_one.data[0].SAF_Contra_TerminationQuote__c);
    skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){});
}

//window.location.reload();
parent.location.reload();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="partysnippet" cachelocation="false">  var  stream_model = skuid.model.getModel('PaymentStreams');
  var  BAmodel = skuid.model.getModel('BankAccount');
  var Appmodel = skuid.model.getModel('APPLICATION');
  var recipientModel=skuid.model.getModel('Recipients');
  var templates = skuid.model.getModel('Documents_Docusign');
  
  var appRow = Appmodel.data[0];
  var envelopeId;
  
  var selItems = recipientModel.data;
console.log('I am here bro');
var objpartysel = [];
var isSignerOnePresentFlag= false;
$.each(selItems,function(i,items){
 
 if(items.dsfs__DocuSign_Recipient_Role__c=='Signer 1'){
     isSignerOnePresentFlag= true;
 }
 if(items && !items.dsfs__Recipient_Email__c)
 {
      alert('Please populate Email field');
      return;
 }else
 {
     objpartysel[i] = items.Account__r.Id;
     recipientEnvelopeId=items.dsfs__DocuSign_EnvelopeID__c;
 }
});

if(!isSignerOnePresentFlag){
    alert('Please ensure atleast one recepient with role \"Signer 1\" is added');
    return;
}


    var lsttemp = templates.data;
    var selItemstemp;
    skuid.$.each(templates.registeredLists,function(){
     selItemstemp = this.getAllRows();
});
   var validIds = [];

	$.each(selItemstemp,function(i,items){
		

		 var templateId = items.DocuSign_Template__r.Template_ID__c;
		 validIds[i] = templateId;
});


    if(objpartysel.length === 0 || validIds.length === 0 || appRow.Equipment_Count__c === 0 ) {
        alert('Please ensure template, Recepients, equipment, and payments have been added. ');
        return;
    }
    else 
    { 
          var payload = new sforce.Xml("Saf_DocusignPayload");
          payload.recipientEnvelopeId= recipientEnvelopeId;
          payload.templates=validIds;
          payload.objpartyIds=objpartysel;
          payload.genappId=appRow.Id;
          payload.straccountId=objpartysel[0];
          payload.genappName=appRow.Name;
         
          var result = sforce.apex.execute("Saf_DocusignEnvelopeRequest","CreateEnvelopeRequestbody", {payload:payload}); 
          //alert(result);
           if(result === 'ERROR')
          {
             alert(result); 
          }
          else
          {
             
              var ret = sforce.apex.execute("SAF_ValidateApplication","ValidateDocumentRaised",{AppId:appRow.Id});  
              window.open(result, '_blank');
             
          }
        
    }</jsitem></javascript><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="cls-picker.css"/></css><actionsequences uniqueid="sk-2eqD-452"/></resources><styles><styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/></styles></skuidpage>

</jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="UpdateSobjectTypeOnLoad" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    
	     // Allow Number Only Char
	        $(document).on( "keypress",".numberOnly input", function (e) { 
    	            var allowedChars = '0123456789.';
                    function contains(stringValue, charValue) {
                        return stringValue.indexOf(charValue) > -1;
                    }
                    var invalidKey = e.key.length === 1 && !contains(allowedChars, e.key)
                            || e.key === '.';
                    invalidKey && e.preventDefault();
            });
            
           // Allow Decimal Only including single dot
	        $(document).on( "keypress",".decimalOnly input", function (e) { 
    	            var allowedChars = '0123456789.';
                    function contains(stringValue, charValue) {
                        return stringValue.indexOf(charValue) > -1;
                    }
                    var invalidKey = e.key.length === 1 && !contains(allowedChars, e.key)
                            || e.key === '.' && contains(e.target.value, '.');
                    invalidKey && e.preventDefault();
            });
    	 
    	 // Prevent Paste  
    	  $(document).on( "paste",".numberOnly input", function (evt) { 
    	        evt.preventDefault();
    	    });

    	   
	    // determine sobject type and prefix
	    if(skuid.page.params.id){
	        getDataFromId();
	    } else if(skuid.page.params.sobjecttype){
	        getDataFromSobjectType();
	    } else {
	        skuid.page.params.sobjecttype = 'genesis__Applications__c';
	        getDataFromSobjectType();
	    }
	    // show button labels as icons
	    showIconicBtnLabelAsTooltip();
	});

    // determine sobject type and prefix from param id
    function getDataFromId(){
        var sobjectPrefix = skuid.page.params.id.substring(0,3);
        var sobjectType = getSobjectType(sobjectPrefix);
        updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix);
    }

    // determine sobject type and prefix from param sobjecttype
    function getDataFromSobjectType(){
        var sobjectType = skuid.page.params.sobjecttype;
        var sobjectPrefix = getSobjectPrefix(sobjectType);
        updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix);
    }
	
	//create a new row in model to set sobject type and prefix
    function updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix){
        skuid.$M("GH_AnySObjectModel").createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'SObjectType', value: sobjectType},
                { field: 'Prefix', value: sobjectPrefix},
            ], doAppend: true
        });
    }
    
	// get sobject name from sobject prefix
	function getSobjectType(prefix) {
        var selectedObjectType;
        // skuid gets object prefix for any polymorphic fields like parentid field on attachment
        skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId").referenceTo.forEach(function(relatedObject){
            if(relatedObject.keyPrefix == prefix){
                selectedObjectType = relatedObject.objectName;
                return false;
            }
        });
        return selectedObjectType;
    }

    // get sobject prefix from sobject type
	function getSobjectPrefix(sobjectType) {
        var prefix;
        // skuid gets object prefix for any polymorphic fields like parentid field on attachment
        skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId").referenceTo.forEach(function(relatedObject){
            if(relatedObject.objectName == sobjectType){
                prefix = relatedObject.keyPrefix;
                return false;
            }
        });
        return prefix;
    }

    $('.sk-1rm_-389').on('mouseenter', function (e) {
        $('sk-1rm_-389').not(this).popover('destroy');
        var InstId = $(this).find("td:first-child").html();
        var InstName = $(this).find("td:first-child").next("td").html();
        if (!$(this).data("bs.popover")) {

            $(this).popover({
                placement: 'right',
                trigger: 'manual',
                html: true,
                title: InstName,
                content: function () {
                    return $.ajax({
                        url: '@Url.Action("ControllerMethod", "Controller")',
                        data: { id: InstId },
                        dataType: 'html'                            
                    }).responseText;
                }
            });

        }

        $(this).popover('show');
    });
}</jsitem></javascript><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="JQueryPopoverUIPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="jquery.webui-popover.min.css"/><cssitem location="staticresource" name="FontAwesomePack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="font-awesome-4.6.3/css/font-awesome.css"/><cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="cls-common.css"/><cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="header.css"/><cssitem location="inline" name="hideIcons" cachelocation="false">.iconic-button-loan-team-communication,.iconic-button-user-list

	    if(skuid.page.params.id){
	        getDataFromId();
	    } else if(skuid.page.params.sobjecttype){
	        getDataFromSobjectType();
	    } else {
	        skuid.page.params.sobjecttype = 'genesis__Applications__c';
	        getDataFromSobjectType();
	    }
	    // show button labels as icons
	    showIconicBtnLabelAsTooltip();
	});

    // determine sobject type and prefix from param id
    function getDataFromId(){
        var sobjectPrefix = skuid.page.params.id.substring(0,3);
        var sobjectType = getSobjectType(sobjectPrefix);
        updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix);
    }

    // determine sobject type and prefix from param sobjecttype
    function getDataFromSobjectType(){
        var sobjectType = skuid.page.params.sobjecttype;
        var sobjectPrefix = getSobjectPrefix(sobjectType);
        updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix);
    }
	
	//create a new row in model to set sobject type and prefix
    function updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix){
        skuid.$M("GH_AnySObjectModel").createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'SObjectType', value: sobjectType},
                { field: 'Prefix', value: sobjectPrefix},
            ], doAppend: true
        });
    }
    
	// get sobject name from sobject prefix
	function getSobjectType(prefix) {
        var selectedObjectType;
        // skuid gets object prefix for any polymorphic fields like parentid field on attachment
        skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId").referenceTo.forEach(function(relatedObject){
            if(relatedObject.keyPrefix == prefix){
                selectedObjectType = relatedObject.objectName;
                return false;
            }
        });
        return selectedObjectType;
    }

    // get sobject prefix from sobject type
	function getSobjectPrefix(sobjectType) {
        var prefix;
        // skuid gets object prefix for any polymorphic fields like parentid field on attachment
        skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId").referenceTo.forEach(function(relatedObject){
            if(relatedObject.objectName == sobjectType){
                prefix = relatedObject.keyPrefix;
                return false;
            }
        });
        return prefix;
    }

    $('.sk-1rm_-389').on('mouseenter', function (e) {
        $('sk-1rm_-389').not(this).popover('destroy');
        var InstId = $(this).find("td:first-child").html();
        var InstName = $(this).find("td:first-child").next("td").html();
        if (!$(this).data("bs.popover")) {

            $(this).popover({
                placement: 'right',
                trigger: 'manual',
                html: true,
                title: InstName,
                content: function () {
                    return $.ajax({
                        url: '@Url.Action("ControllerMethod", "Controller")',
                        data: { id: InstId },
                        dataType: 'html'                            
                    }).responseText;
                }
            });

        }

        $(this).popover('show');
    });
}</jsitem></javascript><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="JQueryPopoverUIPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="jquery.webui-popover.min.css"/><cssitem location="staticresource" name="FontAwesomePack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="font-awesome-4.6.3/css/font-awesome.css"/><cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="cls-common.css"/><cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="header.css"/><cssitem location="inline" name="hideIcons" cachelocation="false">.iconic-button-loan-team-communication,.iconic-button-user-list

    var pageInclude = skuid.$('#relationship-dashboard').data('object');

        pageInclude.load(function() {
            clickQueueEntry(true, sessionStorage.selectedPartyId);
        });
    }
});

function clickQueueEntry(force, partyId) {
    sessionStorage.removeItem('selectedPartyId');
    if (partyId) {
        var clickIndex = 0;
        $.each(skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty').data, function(index, party) {
            if (party.Id === partyId) {
                clickIndex = index;
                return false;
            }
        });
        $($('#relationship-queue .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[clickIndex]).trigger('click');
    } else {
        if (force) {
            $($('#relationship-queue .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[0]).trigger('click');
        }
    }
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="AdjustLayoutRelationshipDashboard" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

var appRow = appModel.data[0];

// Added for Change Request #159440: 27 - Supplier Validation - Starts

var appRowData = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication').data[0];
var appId = appRowData.Id;
var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty');
var partyData = [];
partyData = partyModel.data;

var i = 0;
var canBeSubmitted = false;

for(i=0;i<partyData.length;i++)
{
    if(partyData[i].Party_type_name__c === 'VENDOR' || partyData[i].Party_type_name__c === 'DEALER')
    {
        canBeSubmitted = true;
    }
}

if(!canBeSubmitted && appRow.genesis_Unapproved_Supplier__c !== undefined)
{
    canBeSubmitted = true;
}

// Added for Change Request #159440: 27 - Supplier Validation - Ends

if(canBeSubmitted === true) // Added this condition for Change Request #159440: 27 - Supplier Validation
{
    var r=confirm("Are you sure to submit the application for Approval"); // Moved from 3rd line, for Change Request #159440: 27 - Supplier Validation
    if(r===true)
    {
        try 
        {
            var ret = sforce.apex.execute("SAF_ValidateApplication","Validatestatus",{AppId:appRow.Id});
            if(ret=='failure'){alert('Please ensure party have been added');}
        }
        catch(err) 
        {
            alert(err);
        }
        //window.location.reload();
        window.location = '/'+appRow.Id;
        window.location.reload();
        //skuid.$('.ui-dialog-content').dialog('close');
        //parent.location = '/'+appRow.Id;
        //window.location = '/'+appRow.Id;
    }
}
else
{
    alert('Please ensure there is a Supplier associated to the proposal before submitting to underwriting');
}

	$ = skuid.$;

    var copybtn = 0,editbtn=0,addbtn=0; 
    
    copybtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-copy").is(":visible")?(2):0;
    
    if(copybtn === 0)
    {
        editbtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-edit").is(":visible")?(2):0;
    }
    else
    {
        editbtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-edit").is(":visible")?(copybtn+7):0;
    }
    
    if(copybtn === 0 && editbtn === 0)
    {
        addbtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-add").is(":visible")?(2):0;
    }
    else if(copybtn > 0 && editbtn === 0)
    {
        addbtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-copy").is(":visible")?(copybtn+7):0;
    }
    else if(copybtn === 0 && editbtn > 0)
    {
        addbtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-edit").is(":visible")?(editbtn+7):0;
    }
    else if(copybtn > 0 && editbtn > 0)
    {
        addbtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-edit").is(":visible")?(editbtn+7):0;
    }
    
    $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-copy:visible" ).css('left',copybtn+'%');
    $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-edit:visible" ).css('left',editbtn+'%');
    $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-add:visible" ).css('left',addbtn+'%');

function clickQueueEntry(force, partyId) {
    skuid.model.updateData([skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty')],function(){
        if (partyId) {
            var clickIndex = 0;
            $.each(skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty').data, function(index, party) {
                if (party.Id === partyId) {
                    clickIndex = index;
                    return false;
                }
            });
            $($('#relationship-queue2 .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[clickIndex]).trigger('click');
        } else {
            if (force) {
                $($('#relationship-queue2 .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[0]).trigger('click');
            }
        }
    });

            clickQueueEntry(true, sessionStorage.selectedPartyId);

function clickQueueEntry(force, partyId) {
    sessionStorage.removeItem('selectedPartyId');
    if (partyId) {
        var clickIndex = 0;
        $.each(skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty').data, function(index, party) {
            if (party.Id === partyId) {
                clickIndex = index;
                return false;
            }
        });
        $($('#relationship-queue2 .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[clickIndex]).trigger('click');
    } else {
        if (force) {
            $($('#relationship-queue2 .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[0]).trigger('click');
        }
    }

    skuid.model.updateData([CreateCustCRN],function(){
        
        var queryForCompany = "SELECT AccountNumber FROM Account WHERE AccountNumber = '"+CompNumber+"' ";
        var CustomerCount = sforce.connection.query(queryForCompany);
        console.log(CustomerCount.size);
        
        if(CustomerCount.size > 0)
        {
            var rowsIndividual = [];
            var rowsCorporate = [];
            var rowofficers =[];
            var idnvidual = null;
            var corporate = null;

            var Shareholders = skuid.model.getModel('ShareholderDetails');

                    for( let i=0;i<rowsData.length;i++)
                    {
                        console.log('rowsData:', rowsData[i].id);

                        if(kind.includes("corporate"))
                        {
                             rowsCorporate.push(rowsData[i]);
                        }
                        else if(kind.includes("individual"))
                        {
                            rowsIndividual.push(rowsData[i]);    
                        }
                    }
                }
                
                
                console.log('rowsIndividual:', rowsIndividual);
                console.log('rowsCorporate:', rowsCorporate);
    
                
               if(rowsIndividual.length>0 || rowsCorporate.length>0)

                    console.log('rowsIndividual.length:', rowsIndividual.length);

                    if(rowsOfficersData)
                    {
                        for(j=0;j<rowsOfficersData.length;j++)
                        {
                            rowofficers.push(rowsOfficersData[j]);
                        } 
                    
                    }
                    
                    officers = JSON.stringify(rowofficers);

                    var cDtl = [];

                    {
                    
                        var row = CreateCustCRN.getRows()[i];
                        console.log('company_number::',row.company_number);
                        console.log('company_status::',row.company_name);
                
                        if(CompNumber == row.company_number){
                            cDtl.push({ 
                            'accName': row.company_name,
                            'accNumber': row.company_number,
                            'kycId': row.id,
                            'billingStreet': row.registered_address_line1, 
                            'billingCity': row.registered_city,

                            'regAddressRoad': row.registered_address_road,
                            'regAddressPremises': row.registered_address_premises
                            
                            });
                            break;
                        }
                    
                    }
                    
                    console.log('cDtl'+cDtl);
                    var CRNDetails = JSON.stringify(cDtl);
                    console.log('CRNDetails::' , CRNDetails);
                    console.log('idnvidual::' , idnvidual);
                    console.log('corporate::' , corporate);
                    console.log('officers::' , officers);
                    
                    var result =  sforce.apex.execute(
                    'SAF_ContactsUtils',
                    'updateContactsfromDB',
                    {
                      CRNDetail : CRNDetails,
                      cIndividual : idnvidual,
                      cCorporate : corporate,
                      cOfficers : officers
                    }
                    );
                    
                    console.log(result);
                    alert(result);
               //});
            
            //});
        
        }else{
             alert('customer not available in CL');
        }
    
    }); </jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="UpdateRelationshipDetailsInCL" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var CreateCustCRN = skuid.model.getModel('Datasourcelogin');
var CreateCustCRNRow = CreateCustCRN.data[0];
var CompNumber = params.row.company_number;

var CreateCRNCondition = CreateCustCRN.getConditionByName('company_number');
CreateCustCRN.setCondition(CreateCRNCondition, CompNumber);
    skuid.model.updateData([CreateCustCRN],function(){
        
        var queryForCompany = "SELECT AccountNumber FROM Account WHERE AccountNumber = '"+CompNumber+"' ";
        var CustomerCount = sforce.connection.query(queryForCompany);
        console.log(CustomerCount.size);
        
        if(CustomerCount.size > 0)
        {
            var rowsRelationship = [];
            var relationship = null;
            
            var Relationships = skuid.model.getModel('Relationship');
            var RelationshipsList = Relationships.data;
            var RelationshipsCond = Relationships.getConditionByName('company_Number');
            Relationships.setCondition(RelationshipsCond, CompNumber);
            
            skuid.model.updateData([Relationships],function(){
                var rows = Relationships.getRows()[0];
                var rowsData = Relationships.getRows()[0].data;
                console.log('rowsDatas:', rowsData);
    
                if(rowsData) {
                    for( let i=0;i<rowsData.length;i++)
                    {
                        rowsRelationship.push(rowsData[i]);    
                    }
                }
                
               if(rowsRelationship.length>0 )
                {
                    console.log('Number of Relationship :', rowsRelationship.length);
                    relationship = JSON.stringify(rowsRelationship);
                    console.log('relationship:'+relationship);
					
					 var result =  sforce.apex.execute(
                    'saf_CreateRelationship',
                    'updateRelationshipfromDB',
                    {
                      relationship : relationship
                    }
                    );
                    
                    console.log(result);
                   // alert(result);
                } 
            });
        }
    }); </jsitem></javascript><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="cls-common.css"/><cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="customcss.css"/><cssitem location="staticresource" name="FontAwesomePack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="font-awesome-4.6.3/css/font-awesome.css"/><cssitem location="staticresource" name="JQueryPopoverUIPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="jquery.webui-popover.min.css"/><cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="cls-dashboard.css"/><cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="cls-dialog.css"/><cssitem location="inline" name="custom" cachelocation="false">html {

1.	Proposal Check List <b>(Minimum top 3 must have been received before submitting to underwriting)</b><br>
<br>a)	Proposal form
<br>b)	3 months bank statements or open banking
<br>c)	Write up. 
<br>d)	Accounts
<br>e)	MI
<br><br>

2.	Reasons for tally on Brokers failed proposal <b>(i.e not submitted to UW at all but tally to be recorded via the Launchpad by broker support)</b><br>
<br>a)	Asset out of appetite  
<br>b)	No credit appetite 
<br>c)	Below minimum lend
<br>d)	Regulated 
<br><br>

3.	Grading 1-5 by broker support <b>(Broker Grade on Proposal Checklist)</b><br>

<br>
<b>Hire Purchase / Finance Lease</b> <br>
<br>1.	Only Proposal form initially sent in with minimal information on the business, asset, and supplier.  
<br>2.	Proposal sent with 3 months UTD bank statements only. 
<br><br>3.	Proposal sent with sufficient information, 3 months UTD bank statements, accounts. 
<br>4.	Proposal sent with sufficient information 3 months UTD bank details, accounts, write up and rationale. 
<br>5.	Proposal sent in with comprehensive information, 3 or more months bank statements, MI, comprehensive write up and rationale along with full asset details. 

<br><br>
<b>S&HP back</b><br>
<br>1.	Only Proposal form initially sent in with minimal information on the business, asset. 
<br>2.	Proposal sent with 3 months UTD bank statements only. 
<br>3.	Proposal sent with sufficient information, 3 months UTD bank statements, accounts, full information on asset to obtain valuation. 
<br>4.	Proposal sent with sufficient information 3 months UTD bank details, accounts, write up and rationale, full information on asset to obtain valuation. 
<br>5.	Proposal sent in with comprehensive information, 3 or more months bank statements, MI, comprehensive write up and rationale along with full asset details to obtain valuation along with photos. 
</contents></template></components></popup></action></actions></field></fields></section></sections></column></columns></basicfieldeditor><skootable showconditions="true" showsavecancel="false"   $ = skuid.$;

$(function() {
    var pageInclude = skuid.$('#relationship-dashboard').data('object');
    if(pageInclude !== undefined){
        pageInclude.load(function() {
            clickQueueEntry(true, sessionStorage.selectedPartyId);
        });
    }
});

function clickQueueEntry(force, partyId) {
    sessionStorage.removeItem('selectedPartyId');
    if (partyId) {
        var clickIndex = 0;
        $.each(skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty').data, function(index, party) {
            if (party.Id === partyId) {
                clickIndex = index;
                return false;
            }
        });
        $($('#relationship-queue .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[clickIndex]).trigger('click');
    } else {
        if (force) {
            $($('#relationship-queue .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[0]).trigger('click');
        }
    }
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="AdjustLayoutRelationshipDashboard" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;

if (sessionStorage.refreshParty) {
    sessionStorage.removeItem('refreshParty');
    var pageInclude = skuid.$('#relationship-dashboard').data('object');
    pageInclude.load(function() {
        clickQueueEntry(true, sessionStorage.selectedPartyId);
    });
} else {
    clickQueueEntry(false, sessionStorage.selectedPartyId);
}

function clickQueueEntry(force, partyId) {
    skuid.model.updateData([skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty')],function(){
        if (partyId) {
            var clickIndex = 0;
            $.each(skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty').data, function(index, party) {
                if (party.Id === partyId) {
                    clickIndex = index;
                    return false;
                }
            });
            $($('#relationship-queue .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[clickIndex]).trigger('click');
        } else {
            if (force) {
                $($('#relationship-queue .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[0]).trigger('click');
            }
        }
    });
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="LaunchEditLoanDialog" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

// Added for Change Request #159440: 27 - Supplier Validation - Starts

var appRowData = skuid.model.getModel('NGLDApplication').data[0];
var appId = appRowData.Id;
var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty');
var partyData = [];
partyData = partyModel.data;

var i = 0;
var canBeSubmitted = false;

for(i=0;i<partyData.length;i++)
{
    if(partyData[i].Party_type_name__c === 'VENDOR' || partyData[i].Party_type_name__c === 'DEALER')
    {
        canBeSubmitted = true;
    }
}

if(!canBeSubmitted && appRow.genesis_Unapproved_Supplier__c !== undefined)
{
    canBeSubmitted = true;
}

// Added for Change Request #159440: 27 - Supplier Validation - Ends

if(canBeSubmitted === true) // Added this condition for Change Request #159440: 27 - Supplier Validation
{
    var r=confirm("Are you sure to submit the application for Approval"); // Moved from 3rd line, for Change Request #159440: 27 - Supplier Validation
    if(r===true)
    {
        try 
        {
            var ret = sforce.apex.execute("SAF_ValidateApplication","Validatestatus",{AppId:appRow.Id});
            if(ret=='failure'){alert('Please ensure party have been added');}
        }
        catch(err) 
        {
            alert(err);
        }
        //window.location.reload();
        window.location = '/'+appRow.Id;
        window.location.reload();
        //skuid.$('.ui-dialog-content').dialog('close');
        //parent.location = '/'+appRow.Id;
        //window.location = '/'+appRow.Id;
    }
}
else
{
    alert('Please ensure there is a Supplier associated to the proposal before submitting to underwriting');
}

	$ = skuid.$;

    var copybtn = 0,editbtn=0,addbtn=0; 
    
    copybtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-copy").is(":visible")?(2):0;
    
    if(copybtn === 0)
    {
        editbtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-edit").is(":visible")?(2):0;
    }
    else
    {
        editbtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-edit").is(":visible")?(copybtn+7):0;
    }
    
    if(copybtn === 0 && editbtn === 0)
    {
        addbtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-add").is(":visible")?(2):0;
    }
    else if(copybtn > 0 && editbtn === 0)
    {
        addbtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-copy").is(":visible")?(copybtn+7):0;
    }
    else if(copybtn === 0 && editbtn > 0)
    {
        addbtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-edit").is(":visible")?(editbtn+7):0;
    }
    else if(copybtn > 0 && editbtn > 0)
    {
        addbtn = $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-edit").is(":visible")?(editbtn+7):0;
    }
    
    $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-copy:visible" ).css('left',copybtn+'%');
    $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-edit:visible" ).css('left',editbtn+'%');
    $( ".wrapper-title-custom .iconic-button-add:visible" ).css('left',addbtn+'%');

function clickQueueEntry(force, partyId) {
    skuid.model.updateData([skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty')],function(){
        if (partyId) {
            var clickIndex = 0;
            $.each(skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty').data, function(index, party) {
                if (party.Id === partyId) {
                    clickIndex = index;
                    return false;
                }
            });
            $($('#relationship-queue2 .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[clickIndex]).trigger('click');
        } else {
            if (force) {
                $($('#relationship-queue2 .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[0]).trigger('click');
            }
        }
    });

 function getJson (response) {

 }

  fetch('https://api.getAddress.io'+newRowUrl+'?api-key=i0lhe7bHKEm45UU62lM6BQ30143').then(getJson)

}).catch(function () {

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="UpdateRelationshipIFrame" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;

var url = $('#relationship-iframe').attr('src');
if (url.lastIndexOf('&id=') >= 0) {
    url = url.substring(0, url.lastIndexOf('&id=')) + '&id=' + params.row.Id;
} else {
    url += '&id=' + params.row.Id;
}

$('#relationship-iframe').attr('src', url);
$('#relationship-iframe').hide();
$('#relationship-iframe').on('load', function() {
    $("#relationship-iframe").show();
});</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="refreshpartydash" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

window.location.reload();</jsitem></javascript><css><cssitem location="staticresource" name="FontAwesomePack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="font-awesome-4.6.3/css/font-awesome.css"/><cssitem location="inline" name="simple-queue" cachelocation="false">.party-queue-panel .nx-queue-header {
    display: none;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-list-footer {
    display: none;
}

.party-queue-panel .simple-queue.nx-queue {
    border-top: 0;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-queue-item{
    color: white;
}
.party-queue-panel .nx-queue-item-inner-with-icon {
    height: 55px;
}

.party-queue-panel .sk-icon {
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
    line-height: 30px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 2px solid white;
    margin: 0 15px 0 0;
}

 /*to get the font content, go https://astronautweb.co/snippet/font-awesome/ */

.party-queue-panel .sk-icon.sk-icon-members:before {
    font-family: FontAwesome;
    content: "\f007";
    padding: 4px;
    font-size: 20px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected > .nx-queue-item-inner {
    color: white;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected .sk-icon {
    color: #48ce94;
    border: 2px solid #48ce94;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item {
    border-left: 5px solid #7f7f7f;
    background: #7f7f7f;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item .nx-template {
    white-space: nowrap;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item .nx-queue-loader {
    display: none;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item:hover {
    border-left: 5px solid #2d5074;
}

.party-queue-panel .nx-item.nx-queue-item.nx-queue-item-selected {
    border-left: 5px solid #48ce94;
}</cssitem><cssitem location="inline" name="inlinecss" cachelocation="false">#relationship-dashboard-panelset {

}

#party-container {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 250px;
    right: 0;
    overflow-y: hidden;
}

#relationship-container,
#relationship-container div {
    position: absolute;

.wrapper-title {

    right: 0;
}
.wrapper-title .nx-pagetitle-maintitle {

            </jsitem><jsitem location="inline" name="loadCommonModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
  var $ = skuid.$;
  $('head').append(
      $('<base target="_blank">')
  );
  
  $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
      var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
      var orgParamRow = skuid.model.getModel('OrgParameter').getFirstRow();
      var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('CommonApplicationModel');
      applicationModel.emptyData();
      if(paramId){
            var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
            applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,paramId);
            skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){
                // record type
                var appRecType = applicationModel.data[0].RecordTypeId;
                var applicationRTModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationRecordType');
                var rtIdCondition = applicationRTModel.getConditionByName('Id');
                applicationRTModel.setCondition(rtIdCondition,appRecType);
              
                var productModel = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedProduct');
                var prodIdCondition = productModel.getConditionByName('Id');
                productModel.setCondition(prodIdCondition, applicationModel.data[0].genesis__CL_Product__c);
                skuid.model.updateData([productModel,applicationRTModel],function(){
                    skuid.snippet.getSnippet('fetchAccountData')();
                    skuid.snippet.getSnippet('fetchContactData')();
                });
            });
      }else{
          // fetch record type info
          var appRecType = skuid.page.params.RecordType;
            var applicationRTModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationRecordType');
            var rtIdCondition = applicationRTModel.getConditionByName('Id');
            applicationRTModel.setCondition(rtIdCondition,appRecType);
          
          skuid.model.updateData([applicationRTModel],function(){
              var newRow = applicationModel.createRow({
                    additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'NewBorrower', value:false },
                        { field: 'RecordType', value:applicationRTModel.getFirstRow() },
                        { field: 'RecordTypeId', value:applicationRTModel.getFirstRow().Id },
                    ]
                });
          }); 
      }  
  });
})(skuid);

var applicationRowData = skuid.model.getModel('CommonApplicationModel').data[0];
var commonAccountModel = skuid.model.getModel('CommonAccountModel');

commonAccountModel.emptyData();
biModel.emptyData();

if(applicationRowData && applicationRowData.genesis__Account__c){
    var accountIdCondition = commonAccountModel.getConditionByName('CommonAccId');
    commonAccountModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition,applicationRowData.genesis__Account__c);
    skuid.model.updateData([commonAccountModel],function(){
        if(!(commonAccountModel.data && commonAccountModel.data.length > 0)){
            var newPSRow = commonAccountModel.createRow({ });

            if(commonAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c){
                // fetch business info
                var bIdCondition = biModel.getConditionByName('BusinessInfoId');
                biModel.setCondition(bIdCondition,commonAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c);
                skuid.model.updateData([biModel],function(){});
            }else{
                var newBIRow = biModel.createRow({ });
            }
        }
    });    
}else{
    if(!(commonAccountModel.data && commonAccountModel.data.length > 0)){
        var newPSRow = commonAccountModel.createRow({ });
        var newBIRow = biModel.createRow({ });
    } 
}

            applicationRowData.genesis__Account__r.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__r.Name.toUpperCase() == 'SOLE PROPRIETORSHIP')){
        var accountIdCondition = commonContactModel.getConditionByName('AccountId');
        commonContactModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition,applicationRowData.genesis__Account__c);
        skuid.model.updateData([commonContactModel],function(){
